logo.name: Paws & Wiggles Logo
logo.description: Logo featuring a playful Welsh Corgi silhouette with the text 'Paws & Wiggles' in cheerful font.

sections.title: Welcome to Paws & Wiggles
sections.subtitle: A Corgi's Home Away From Home
sections.name: hero-section
sections.label: Home
sections.content:
**Experience Top-Notch Daycare for Your Furry Friend**  
At Paws & Wiggles, we understand the unique needs of your Welsh Corgi. Our dedicated team ensures a day full of fun, adventure, and plenty of tail wags.

images.name: Happy Corgi at Play
images.description: A joyful Corgi running in an open field.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Story
sections.name: about-section
sections.label: About
sections.content:
**Caring for Corgis is Our Passion!**  
Founded by dedicated dog lovers, Paws & Wiggles is more than just a daycare. We strive to create a safe, fun, and nurturing environment where your Corgi feels loved and secure. Our staff are trained in pet first aid and are experienced in handling the playful nature of Corgis.

images.name: Corgi Group Play
images.description: A group of Corgis playing together at the daycare.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: What We Offer
sections.name: services-section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Full-Day Daycare:** Drop off your Corgi for a day filled with supervised play and socialization.  
- **Half-Day Daycare:** Perfect for those who need a shorter stay.  
- **Special Corgi Activities:** Corgi-themed agility courses and group activities designed to engage your pet.  
- **Overnight Boarding:** Peace of mind for when you are away overnight, knowing your Corgi is in good hands.

images.name: Corgi Agility Course
images.description: Corgis enjoying an agility course designed for their build.

sections.title: Meet Our Team
sections.subtitle: Passionate Pet Carers
sections.name: team-section
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our team consists of dedicated pet lovers who treat every Corgi as their own. With extensive training in canine care, our experts ensure each day is a happy day for your pet.

images.name: Team Leader Jane Doe
images.description: Headshot of Jane Doe, the lead care specialist.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.subtitle: Contact Us
sections.name: contact-section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
**Location:** 123 Barker Lane, Caninetown  
**Phone:** (123) 456-7890  
**Email:** info@pawsandwiggles.com  
Feel free to reach out to us for any inquiries or to book a tour of our facilities!
